text: Ðis sinde þa londe gemære in to Mortune.
Ærest of grindeles pytt on wiðimære.
Of þam sloh up on þa fearnige leage.
Of þere dune on beran heafde.
Of bearan heafde on wude crofte.
Of þam crofte on carca dic.
Of ðere dice on þene blace pol.
Of þam pole æfter long pidele in to þam mersce.
Of þam mersce<../images/tbar.gif>æft on grindeles pytt.
